chunk:
Root Science Facial Serum, Bare

Brand: Root Science

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*, Silybum Marianum (Milk Thistle) Seed Oil*, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Seed Oil*, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil*, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Seed Oil*, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil*, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*,

(Camellia) Seed Oil*, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil*, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Seed Oil*, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil*, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Seed Oil*, Rubus Idaeus (Red Raspberry) Seed Oil*, Nigella Sativa (Black Cumin) Seed Oil*, Calophyllum Inophyllum (Tamanu) Seed

Oil*, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Seed Oil*, Rubus Idaeus (Red Raspberry) Seed Oil*, Nigella Sativa (Black Cumin) Seed Oil*, Calophyllum Inophyllum (Tamanu) Seed Oil*, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Extract*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E).

Directions: Use as daily facial moisturizer. Apply 1-2 pumps of nutrient rich serum to face and d collet morning and night. Allow serum to absorb for several minutes.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
